**Relevant Ghanaian policies**

- The [Labour Act, 2003 (Act 651)](https://www.ilo.org/dyn/natlex/docs/SERIAL/66955/63431/F1429852156/GHA66955.pdf) regulates employment and labour issues in Ghana. This Act consolidates all laws relating to labour, employers, trade unions and industrial relations and introduces provisions to reflect ratified ILO Conventions.
